title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
description: When creating a chart and setting the data definition, if a column without data is selected, there should be a pop-up error message to remind the user.
OB: Currently, when selecting a column without data, no error message is displayed and the chart remains empty.
EB: When selecting a column without data for a series, a friendly error message should pop up to alert the user that there is no data available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a chart and set the data definition.
2. Select a column without any data.
3. Observe that no error message is displayed and the chart remains empty.
